casebody.data:
MORGAN
v.
MILLENNIUM STAFFING. No. 533P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2008. Shannon P. Metcalf, Charlotte, for Millennium Staffing, et al.

*487The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of December 2007 by Plaintiff Objecting to Defendant's Motion to Dismiss Plaintiffs "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2008."
